overview:
Amit Koshal is Senior Vice President - New Media of Balaji Telefilms, India’s largest Production House. He is spear heading the digital business of the group.

Earlier to that Amit was a Co-Founder at FirstDialog, which he exited with a successful sell-off. He is a seasoned business strategy and development professional and has worked in multiple senior management positions at startups and multinationals including ACL Wireless, MySpace India (News Corp, USA) as India Business Head for Mobile business and UTV spearheading the new media products as Associate Vice President.
